comment: Main grades are essays. Super caring  teacher who is more than willing to help you if you need it. In my class  our essays had fairly open essay topics so you would actually care about what you're writing about and again help you at any point.
Easy and definitely would take again. In high school I rarely got an A in English with her I got a high A. Very good overall. Do the work get an A. Very nice.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is very sweet and cares about the students. Reminds me a lot of a high school teacher she is very accessible and willing to help you. Enjoyed lectures. She gives you clear instructions and will clarify things. The only downside was there is a lot of homework in the class including journals reading quizzes essays. Do all the work you'll do okay.

She's AWESOME! Very clear with what she wants, and if you don't get it, shoot her an email or ask her after class. She's always there for you. Don't forget to take your quizzes at the beginning of the semester! EASY A! Just write your papers on time, and attend her "show" and you'll be fine; even if you don't try very hard you'll come out with a B+
Confusing with her assignments, I took a hybrid class and I'm so lost
